taskDescription:
Convert <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mn>1011</mn>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{1011_2}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mn>1010101</mn>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{1010101_2}</annotation></semantics></math> to base 10. Then multiply those base 10 numbers. Next, convert the answer you got for Exercise 31 to base 10. Do these numbers match?
